body:
Comment 5: 
I am not having argument about whether there is a bug in wine or not. It is up to wine
developers to make these calls.

But "the stack must by 16-byte aligned" is a Microsoft requirement. Just because we've
been lucky before, does not mean our luck will continue. What is the benefit of not
implementing alignment as specified? Please, note that most of our syscalls are aligned
already: http://tip.golang.org/src/pkg/runtime/sys_windows_amd64.s#L8

Alex
